home.accessibilityInfo: refers to the design of products, devices, services, or environments to be usable by all people, to the greatest extent possible,
home.accessibilityExtra: without the need for adaptation or specialized design.
home.accessibilityExtraB: The goal of accessibility is to ensure that individuals with a wide range of abilities and disabilities can access and use these things in a way that is similar to those without such limitations.

a11y.title: Accessibility Options
a11y.fontSizeDescription: Change the font size of the web page.
a11y.toggleLinkHighlightDescription: You can Highlight all the links.
